name: Globkurier Shipping method for WooCommerce
author: CUBE

sections.description:
Globkurier Shipping Plugin for WooCommerce. Allows shipment via the service Globkurier.
WooCommerce is a powerful, extendable eCommerce plugin that helps you sell anything. Beautifully.
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 4.1 or greater
  • WooCommerce 2.6 or greater
  • PHP version 5.2.4 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.0 or greater

Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option as WordPress handles the file transfers itself and you don’t need to leave your web browser.
To do an automatic install of Globkurier Shipping, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New …

Updating

Automatic updates should work like a charm; as always though, ensure you backup your site just in case.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 4.1 or greater
  • WooCommerce 2.6 or greater
  • PHP version 5.2.4 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.0 or greater

Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option as WordPress handles the file transfers itself and you don’t need to leave your web browser.
To do an automatic install of Globkurier Shipping, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New …

Updating

Automatic updates should work like a charm; as always though, ensure you backup your site just in case.

Where can I find Globkurier documentation and user guides?

For help setting up and configuring Globkurier please contact to webmaster@cube3d.pl Cube3D Studio.

Where can I get support or talk to other users?

If you get stuck, you can ask for help on webmaster@cube3d.pl Cube3D Studio.
